    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pomagajmo si</string>
            <string language="en">Helping each other</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helfen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'aider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajudando-se a</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assistenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοήθεια του ενός τον άλλον</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayudarse</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učna priprava je namenjena za 3. razred na temo pomagajmo si. Učenci spznavajo nujnost sodelovanja, medsebojne strpnosti, argumentirajo svoje mnenje in istočasno poslušajo druge. Preizkusijo se v igrah vlog.</string>
            <string language="en">Organizing lesson about helping each other, co-operation, tolerance, society, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pomoč</string>
            <string language="en">help</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sodelovanje</string>
            <string language="en">co-operation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">strpnost</string>
            <string language="en">tolerance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družba</string>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisierende Lektion über das Helfen, 
Mitarbeit, Toleranz, Gesellschaft...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon d'organisation au sujet de s'aider, 
coopération, tolérance, société...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição organizando sobre a ajuda de, 
cooperação, tolerância, sociedade...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione d'organizzazione circa l'assistenza, 
cooperazione, tolleranza, società...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανώνοντας το μάθημα για τη βοήθεια του ενός τον 
άλλον, συνεργασία, ανοχή, κοινωνία...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lección de ordenación sobre ayudarse, 
cooperación, tolerancia, sociedad...</string>
          </description>
